scripts.cover: nyc --instrument false --reporter=lcov mochify -R dot --transform [babelify --ignore [ test ] --plugins [ babel-plugin-istanbul ] ] --allow-chrome-as-root
scripts.test: npm run terser && npm run eslint && npm run cover
scripts.package: npm run clean && npm run terser && zip -r gentle-alerts.zip gentle-alerts
scripts.clean: rm -f gentle-alerts/gentle-alerts.min.js && rm -f gentle-alerts.zip && find | grep DS | xargs rm -f
